channel.description: Recent content in notes on S Black (dot) Rocks

item.title: More Frequent Notes
item.description: find me notes on blog.sblack.rocks I’ve started using evernote and with it discovered Postach.io, which is freak’in cool! Now I can publish my evernote notes here blog.sblack.rocks/ without doing anything :) I still like having a static site on github though, I don’t really need anything more. Having control over all the files and (some) control of the content serving is great so I don’t plan on deleting this one… although wagtail has caught my eye as a side project for my (non-existent) free-time ;)
